code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[longUrl,setLongUrl]=useState("");const[shortUrl,setShortUrl]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post("/api/shorten",{longUrl});setShortUrl(res.data.shortUrl);}catch(err){alert("Error creating short URL");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:"5rem"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDD17 URL Shortener"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"url",placeholder:"Enter a long URL...",value:longUrl,onChange:e=>setLongUrl(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:"60%",padding:"10px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{padding:"10px 20px",marginLeft:"10px"},children:"Shorten"})]}),shortUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Short URL:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:shortUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:shortUrl})]})]});}export default App;
